messages.message:
David
Brian, Jessie, Jessica: Please go through your friends and come up with ideas for people who would be good to invite to Mexico. Heather wants single people so she's not a [3rd, 5th, 7th, 9th...] wheel, and even better if there's someone she can get with. We need to send this now because people have about a week to order a passport and get it in time.

David
Here are my ideas. Please comment on the appropriateness and desirability of inviting these people!

Alicia + Joe (Alicia's fun...),
Andrea + Doug (Dunno if Doug's cool for a trip like this, but Andrea is for sure.),
Ashley + Sam,
Ben (Maybe good for Heather? If I was a chick, I'd jump Ben.)
Elyse + Steve,
Jenna (I know Brian hates her, but she's totally fun to party with.),
Joanna + Keifer,
Katelyn + Jesse,
Meaghan,
Mel (Dunno if she's even alive, mutually exclusive with Andrea.)
Talbert,
Teresa + Joe (They'll never agree to come. Maybe Kelsey?),
Travis

Brian
Andrea and doug
Ashley and sam
Ben
Jenna
Joanna and keifer
Katlyn and jesse
talbert?

David
Oh, hey, I didn't mean that I would look up my friends and then we'd all vote. You all still have to look at your friends too!

Brian
Andrew
Chase
Forrest
Jeffrey
John Meyer
Ramie and Amanda from next door?

Jessica
Don't invite the neighbors. I know they are cute, but they have somethimg very different then us going, and feelings will be hurt as usual.

Jessica
The only person I can think of that would want to go would be my friend Jamie... she is the mutual acquaintance whose visit led me to be at Jessie's party and meet Brian. I think only Brian has met her, though.

Brian
What do you mean by feelings will be hurt?

Jessica
Well... have you ever gotten a friendly vibe from them? Amicable acquaintance, sure, but friends? You always seem so dejected when you get shut down by them.

Brian
I wouldn't say my feelings have ever been hurt.  I am indifferent about my relationshipb with them and would be willing to reach out to them for a friendship in the future.  So if other people would enjoy their company, then I would be all for inviting them.

David
I veto relatives of Brian. Whether the neighbors are a good idea or not you would know better than me. I spose John Meyer would be fine. Who's Jeffrey? Jessie, invite your friend! Unless you think it's a bad idea.
